null_results.description: Daily regime-aware Donchian — HMM and vol regime overlays on daily BTC Donchian
null_results.reason: DSR never exceeded 0.95 at N=1552+. Statistical bar too high for daily data resolution. 2022 bear is structural for long-only.
null_results.recommendation: Do not continue daily-data regime sweeps. Use hourly data for more statistical power.

null_results.description: XGBoost on hourly feature matrix — 23-88 features, gradient boosted classification
null_results.reason: 52.9% accuracy. Feature expansion 58->88 features did not achieve statistical significance.
null_results.recommendation: Feature engineering needs fundamentally different approach, not more features of the same type.

null_results.description: Kelly criterion sizing on meta-labeled Donchian — calibrated and uncalibrated variants
null_results.reason: Meta-model accuracy 56% makes Kelly bets tiny. Edge is in trade filtering, not probability-based sizing. Platt calibration collapses probability spread (std=0.032).
null_results.recommendation: Kelly requires higher accuracy meta-models. Use inverse_vol sizing instead.

null_results.description: ETH Bollinger Band strategies on 4h timeframe
null_results.reason: Dominated by Donchian on all metrics. Not a competitive standalone signal type for ETH.
null_results.recommendation: Do not pursue Bollinger as primary signal for ETH.
